name: aibeats
description: AIBeats label (X402 Architecture) is a decentralized, on-chain music generation and distribution platform powered by Coinbase’s X402 payment protocol on Base mainnet. The service allows anyone to generate AI-created music tracks on demand - without user accounts, subscriptions, or custodial wallets - using a pure pay-per-use model with USDC payments. The project’s broader mission is to democratize AI-driven music creation while maintaining transparency, ownership, and creative authenticity.
